name: Limited Vision - Collaborative Project
description:
This was a collaborative project between myself and a 3D modeller that we complete for our games development course at college. We were given the restriction of 'Limited Vision' to base our project around. We decided to create some underground ruins the player must navigate with the use of their grappling hook, in order to avoid traps, collect the treasure, and escape the ruins safely.

WASD - Movement, SPACE - Jump, LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Grapple, LEFT SHIFT - Unhook.
